Achilles tendinopathy.symptoms: pain at the back of the heel, tenderness when touched, slight warmth, weakness in ankle and foot
Achilles tendinopathy.Info: A condition where the tendon at the back of the ankle becomes sore, usually from overuse or injury.

Acne.symptoms: pimples, oily skin, skin feels hot or sore, blackheads, whiteheads, red bumps, pus-filled spots, deep lumps
Acne.Info: A common skin problem where pores get blocked, leading to spots on the face, back, or chest.

Acute cholecystitis.symptoms: pain in upper right belly, fever, nausea, vomiting, yellow skin or eyes
Acute cholecystitis.Info: Inflammation of the gallbladder, often caused by gallstones, requiring quick treatment.

Acute lymphoblastic leukaemia.symptoms: easy bruising, frequent nosebleeds, tiredness, fever, bone or joint pain, pale skin, shortness of breath, frequent infections
Acute lymphoblastic leukaemia.Info: A fast-growing blood cancer where abnormal white blood cells build up in the bone marrow.

Acute myeloid leukaemia.symptoms: pale skin, easy bruising, frequent nosebleeds, tiredness, fever, weight loss, frequent infections
Acute myeloid leukaemia.Info: A blood cancer affecting myeloid cells, leading to abnormal white blood cell production.

Acute pancreatitis.symptoms: sudden severe belly pain, pain spreading to the back, nausea, vomiting, fever
Acute pancreatitis.Info: Sudden inflammation of the pancreas that needs urgent hospital care.

Acute respiratory infection.symptoms: cough, runny nose, sneezing, sore throat, fever
Acute respiratory infection.Info: Infection of the nose, throat, or lungs, often spreading like a cold.

Addisonâ€™s disease.symptoms: tiredness, weight loss, low blood pressure, darkened skin, belly pain, mood changes
Addisonâ€™s disease.Info: A condition where the adrenal glands do not make enough hormones.

Adenomyosis.symptoms: painful periods, heavy bleeding, lower belly cramps
Adenomyosis.Info: When the lining of the womb grows into the muscle wall of the uterus.

Alcohol-related liver disease.symptoms: tiredness, loss of appetite, weight loss, yellow skin or eyes, swollen belly, easy bruising
Alcohol-related liver disease.Info: Liver damage caused by drinking too much alcohol over time.

Allergic rhinitis.symptoms: sneezing, runny nose, blocked nose, itchy eyes, watery eyes, reduced smell
Allergic rhinitis.Info: An allergy that causes swelling inside the nose, often due to pollen or dust.

Allergies.symptoms: skin rash, itching, swelling, coughing, shortness of breath, vomiting, diarrhea
Allergies.Info: When the immune system reacts too strongly to certain foods or substances.
